1.0.name: wordpress/verify-google-webmaster-tools
1.0.description:
Adding Google Webmaster Tools verification code to your website has never been easier. Simply copy and paste your verification meta tag and that's it!

Why use Google Webmaster Tools?

  • Analyze your website's performance on Google search engine;
  • Get ideas for improving the website;
  • ...and more.

For more information visit: Google Webmaster Tools or OnlineAds.lt.
